verses.text: The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the Jews which dwell in the land of Egypt , which dwell at Migdol , and at Tahpanhes , and at Noph , and in the country of Pathros , saying ,

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Ye have seen all the evil that I have brought upon Jerusalem , and upon all the cities of Judah ; and, behold, this day they \add are\add* a desolation , and no man dwelleth therein,

Because of their wickedness which they have committed to provoke me to anger , in that they went to burn incense , \add and\add* to serve other gods , whom they knew not, \add neither\add* they, ye, nor your fathers.
Howbeit I sent unto you all my servants the prophets , rising early and sending \add them\add*, saying , Oh, do not this abominable thing that I hate.
But they hearkened not, nor inclined their ear to turn from their wickedness , to burn no incense unto other gods.
Wherefore my fury and mine anger was poured forth , and was kindled in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem ; and they are wasted \add and\add* desolate , as at this day.

Therefore now thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the God of hosts , the God of Israel ; Wherefore commit ye \add this\add* great evil against your souls , to cut off from you man and woman , child and suckling , out of Judah , to leave you none to remain ;\f + \fr 44.7 \ft out…: Heb. out of the midst of Judah\f*

In that ye provoke me unto wrath with the works of your hands , burning incense unto other gods in the land of Egypt , whither ye be gone to dwell , that ye might cut yourselves off , and that ye might be a curse and a reproach among all the nations of the earth ?

Have ye forgotten the wickedness of your fathers , and the wickedness of the kings of Judah , and the wickedness of their wives , and your own wickedness , and the wickedness of your wives , which they have committed in the land of Judah , and in the streets of Jerusalem ?\f + \fr 44.9 \ft wickedness…: Heb. wickednesses, or, punishments, etc\f*

They are not humbled \add even\add* unto this day , neither have they feared , nor walked in my law , nor in my statutes , that I set before you and before your fathers.\f + \fr 44.10 \ft humbled: Heb. contrite\f* \p
¶ Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Behold, I will set my face against you for evil , and to cut off all Judah.

And I will take the remnant of Judah , that have set their faces to go into the land of Egypt to sojourn there, and they shall all be consumed , \add and\add* fall in the land of Egypt ; they shall \add even\add* be consumed by the sword \add and\add* by the famine : they shall die , from the least even unto the greatest , by the sword and by the famine : and they shall be an execration , \add and\add* an astonishment , and a curse , and a reproach.
For I will punish them that dwell in the land of Egypt , as I have punished Jerusalem , by the sword , by the famine , and by the pestilence :

So that none of the remnant of Judah , which are gone into the land of Egypt to sojourn there, shall escape or remain , that they should return into the land of Judah , to the which they have a desire to return to dwell there: for none shall return but such as shall escape.\f + \fr 44.14 \ft have…: Heb. lift up their soul\f* \p

¶ Then all the men which knew that their wives had burned incense unto other gods , and all the women that stood by , a great multitude , even all the people that dwelt in the land of Egypt , in Pathros , answered Jeremiah , saying ,
\add As for\add* the word that thou hast spoken unto us in the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, we will not hearken unto thee.

But we will certainly do whatsoever thing goeth forth out of our own mouth , to burn incense unto the queen of heaven , and to pour out drink offerings unto her, as we have done , we, and our fathers , our kings , and our princes , in the cities of Judah , and in the streets of Jerusalem : for \add then\add* had we plenty of victuals , and were well , and saw no evil.\f + \fr 44.17 \ft queen…: or, frame of heaven\f*\f + \fr 44.17 \ft victuals: Heb. bread\f*
But since we left off to burn incense to the queen of heaven , and to pour out drink offerings unto her, we have wanted all \add things\add*, and have been consumed by the sword and by the famine.

And when we burned incense to the queen of heaven , and poured out drink offerings unto her, did we make her cakes to worship her, and pour out drink offerings unto her, without our men ?\f + \fr 44.19 \ft men: or, husbands?\f* \p
¶ Then Jeremiah said unto all the people , to the men , and to the women , and to all the people which had given him \add that\add* answer , saying ,

The incense that ye burned in the cities of Judah , and in the streets of Jerusalem , ye, and your fathers , your kings , and your princes , and the people of the land , did not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* remember them, and came it \add not\add* into his mind ?

So that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* could no longer bear , because of the evil of your doings , \add and\add* because of the abominations which ye have committed ; therefore is your land a desolation , and an astonishment , and a curse , without an inhabitant , as at this day.

Because ye have burned incense , and because ye have sinned against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have not obeyed the voice of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, nor walked in his law , nor in his statutes , nor in his testimonies ; therefore this evil is happened unto you, as at this day.
Moreover Jeremiah said unto all the people , and to all the women , Hear the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all Judah that \add are\add* in the land of Egypt :

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel , saying ; Ye and your wives have both spoken with your mouths , and fulfilled with your hand , saying , We will surely perform our vows that we have vowed , to burn incense to the queen of heaven , and to pour out drink offerings unto her: ye will surely accomplish your vows , and surely perform your vows.

Therefore hear ye the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all Judah that dwell in the land of Egypt ; Behold, I have sworn by my great name , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that my name shall no more be named in the mouth of any man of Judah in all the land of Egypt , saying , The Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* liveth.

Behold, I will watch over them for evil , and not for good : and all the men of Judah that \add are\add* in the land of Egypt shall be consumed by the sword and by the famine , until there be an end of them.

Yet a small number that escape the sword shall return out of the land of Egypt into the land of Judah , and all the remnant of Judah , that are gone into the land of Egypt to sojourn there, shall know whose words shall stand , mine, or theirs.\f + \fr 44.28 \ft mine…: Heb. from me, or, from them\f* \p

¶ And this \add shall be\add* a sign unto you, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will punish you in this place , that ye may know that my words shall surely stand against you for evil :

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will give Pharaoh-hophra king of Egypt into the hand of his enemies , and into the hand of them that seek his life ; as I gave Zedekiah king of Judah into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon , his enemy , and that sought his life.
